mapper.insert:
insert into db_proxy.sardine_wavebill
uuid,
billNumber,
serialArchUuid,
serialArchcode,
serialArchname,
waveType,
remark,
state,
companyUuid,
version,
CREATEDTIME,
CREATEDID,
CREATEDCode,
CREATEDName,
LASTMODIFYTIME,
LASTMODIFYID,
LASTMODIFYCode,
LASTMODIFYName,
#{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{billNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{serialArch.uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{serialArch.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{serialArch.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{waveType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{companyUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createInfo.time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{createInfo.operator.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createInfo.operator.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createInfo.operator.fullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{lastModifyInfo.time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{lastModifyInfo.operator.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{lastModifyInfo.operator.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{lastModifyInfo.operator.fullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.delete: delete from db_proxy.sardine_wavebill where uuid=#{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and version=#{version,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}
mapper.update:
update db_proxy.sardine_wavebill
serialArchUuid=#{serialArch.uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
serialArchcode=#{serialArch.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
serialArchname=#{serialArch.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
waveType=#{waveType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark=#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
state=#{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
version=#{version,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}+1,
LASTMODIFYTIME = #{lastModifyInfo.time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LASTMODIFYID = #{lastModifyInfo.operator.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LASTMODIFYCODE = #{lastModifyInfo.operator.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LASTMODIFYNAME = #{lastModifyInfo.operator.fullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
uuid=#{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and version=#{version,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}
mapper.select: select t.* from db_proxy.sardine_wavebill t where t.billNumber=#{billNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t.companyUuid = #{companyUuid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: update db_proxy.sardine_waveAlcntcitem set state = 'Initial' where waveBillnumber = #{waveBillNumber, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and companyUuid = #{companyUuid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete: delete from db_proxy.sardine_waveAlcntcitem where waveBillNumber = #{waveBillNumber, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and companyUuid = #{companyUuid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into db_proxy.sardine_waveAlcntcitem( alcNtcBillUuid, alcNtcBillNumber,state, CUSTOMERUUID, CUSTOMERCODE, CUSTOMERNAME, CUSTOMERTYPE ,WRHUUID, WRHCODE,WRHNAME,DELIVERYMODE,ARTICLEUUID, ARTICLECODE,ARTICLENAME,ARTICLESPEC,alcqty, waveuuid,wavebillnumber, companyuuid, alcntcitemuuid ) select a.uuid alcNtcBillUuid, a.BILLNUMBER alcNtcBillNumber,'Initial', a.CUSTOMERUUID, a.CUSTOMERCODE, a.CUSTOMERNAME, c.CUSTOMERTYPE ,a.WRHUUID, a.WRHCODE,a.WRHNAME,a.DELIVERYMODE,ai.ARTICLEUUID, ai.ARTICLECODE,ai.ARTICLENAME,ai.ARTICLESPEC,ai.QTY alcqty, #{waveUuid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{waveBillNumber, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, a.companyuuid, ai.uuid from db_proxy.sardine_alcntcbill a, db_proxy.sardine_alcntcbillitem ai, db_proxy.sardine_customer c where a.uuid = ai.ALCNTCBILLUUID and a.CUSTOMERUUID = c.uuid and a.waveBillNumber = #{waveBillNumber, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.companyuuid = #{companyUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY alcNtcBillUuid
mapper.update: update db_proxy.sardine_wavealcntcitem t set t.pickorder = (select concat_ws('-', l.code, c.LINEORDER) from db_proxy.sardine_serialarchline l, db_proxy.sardine_serialarchlinecustomer c where l.UUID = c.SERIALARCHLINEUUID and l.SERIALARCHUUID = #{serialarchUuid, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and c.CUSTOMERUUID = t.CUSTOMERUUID) where t.waveUuid = #{waveUuid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select distinct t.articleuuid from db_proxy.sardine_waveAlcntcitem t where t.waveBillNumber = #{waveBillNumber, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t.companyUuid = #{companyUuid, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t.state = 'Initial'
mapper.insert: insert into db_proxy.sardine_wavepickupitem( alcntcbilluuid, alcntcbillnumber, customeruuid, customerCode, customername, deliveryType, operateMethod, type, pickAreauuid, pickAreacode, pickAreaname, bincode, containerbarcode, articleuuid, articlecode, articlename, articlespec, munit, qpcStr, qty, caseQtyStr, itemVolume, volume, alcNtcBillItemUuid, waveBillNumber, waveUuid, binUsage, companyUuid, pickOrder ) values ( #{alcNtcBillUuid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{alcNtcBillNumber, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customer.uuid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customer.code, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customer.name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deliveryType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operateMethod, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pickArea.uuid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pickArea.code, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pickArea.name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{binCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{containerBarcode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{article.uuid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{article.code, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{article.name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{articleSpec, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{munit, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qpcStr, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qty, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{caseQtyStr, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemVolume, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{volume, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{alcNtcBillItemUuid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{waveBillNumber, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{waveUuid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{binUsage, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyUuid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pickOrder, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: select distinct t.customeruuid, t.customercode, t.customername, t.deliveryType, t.operateMethod, t.type, t.pickareauuid, t.pickareacode, t.pickareaname, t.volume, t.waveuuid from db_proxy.sardine_wavepickupitem t where t.waveUuid = #{uuid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
